repast.simphony.demos.sugarscape2.agents.rules.sex

Interface SexAbility

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CulturalSexAbility, DefaultSexAbility, DefaultSexAbilitySugarSpice, NoSexAbility

    public interface SexAbility

    • Method Detail

      • selectPotentialMates

        java.lang.Iterable<SugarAgent_ch3> selectPotentialMates(SugarAgent_ch3 a)
        Selection of the SugarAgent_ch3s to mate with. The mates returned should be the fertile neighbors. In this method we do not care whether the potential mates have the resources to have children or not.
        Parameters:
        a - The SugarAgent_ch3 that will perform the selection
        Returns:
        An Iterable of SugarAgent_ch3 that have been selected for mating. If no SugarAgent_ch3 is available, returns an empty Iterable

      • giveBirth

        org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<SugarAgent_ch3,repast.simphony.space.grid.GridPoint> giveBirth(SugarAgent_ch3 a1,
                                                                                                   SugarAgent_ch3 a2)
        The mating procedure. The responsibilities of this method are:
        • Check that the resources for having a child is enough for both parents/li>
        • Create the SugarAgent_ch3 child
        • Find the GridPoint location where it should be born
        • Remove any resources from the parents and transfer them to the child
        Parameters:
        a1 - the SugarAgent_ch2 that is the calling object of the mating
        a2 - the SugarAgent_ch2 that is the second part of the mating
        Returns:
        A map that contains the SugarAgent_ch2 child and the position it should be located. In case no child can be born, returns an empty map.

        Returns:
